name: Admin User Remote Logon
description: Detect remote login by Administrator user (depending on internal pattern).
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:10 AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:/[Nn][Ee][Gg][Oo][Tt][Ii][Aa][Tt][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:/[Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn].*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:4624 AND winlog.event_data.LogonType:10 AND winlog.event_data.AuthenticationPackageName:Negotiate AND winlog.event_data.TargetUserName:Admin*)`
